thread.section_title: Airyhair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airyhair | airyhair.com
thread.title: Ashley L.

author: Ashley L.
title: Ashley L.
text: I am a first time extension user. I emailed the company many times with questions. They always answered and were extremely helpful. I ordered the clip in extensions. They are very soft and I am pleased with the quality. I have played with my kids, worked outside and many other things and I have had less tangles in my extension than in my own hair. I have had them for almost a week now and have styled them many different ways. I love them and will be ordering for them again soon. I want to try the i tip extensions.
